title: ED RUSCHA -ESQUE 3D TYPE
content:
hi all

can anyone help me with this?  
is it custom?

best  
rr
author: richieRich01

comments.content: The 3D effect is custom, of course. The font itself looks like a common or garden "Collegiate" font. [http://www.dafont.com/search.php?psize=m&q=college](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?psize=m&q=college "http://www.dafont.com/search.php?psize=m&q=college")

Similar dimensional fonts:  
 [PowerStation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/michaeldoret.com/AlphabetSoup/powerstation.html) by [Michael Doret](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michael%20Doret)  
 [Ironmonger Three D](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Ironmonger/styles) by [John Downer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Downer)  
 [Knox](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100014) by [Hoefler & Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hoefler%20%2526%20Frere-Jones)  
 [Fire Down Below NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/fire-down-below-nf/) by [Nick Curtis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nick%20Curtis)  
 [Chromatose](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/chromatose) by [Lex Kominek](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lex%20Kominek)  
 [Bevel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/bevel_1) by [Nathan Cox](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nathan%20Cox)  
 [Carved Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gallofonts/carved-initials/) by [Gerald Gallo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gerald%20Gallo)  
 [LHF Big Dog](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/bigdog.php), [Convecta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/convecta.shtml), [Quadrex](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/quadrex.php), [Menace](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/menace.php), [Cool Blue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/coolblue.shtml) by [Chuck Davis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chuck%20Davis)  
 [Popups](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=popups) by [Harold Lohner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Harold%20Lohner)  
 [LHF Jumbo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/jumbo.shtml) by [John Studden](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/John%20Studden)  
 [Hopeless Diamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.virusfonts.com/fonts/hopeless-diamond) by [Jonathan Barnbrook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Barnbrook)  
 [Idler](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T1770) by [Mark Butchko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Butchko)

Closest, however, is [Prismatiq JNL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/prismatiq/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D146%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DMEETINGS%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D26?refby=mfde).

A dimensional Capitalis with serifs:  
 [Trillium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/www.photolettering.com/letterer/?layout=CopelandTrilliumOutline)  
And one without:  
 [Roma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414225850/http:/myfonts.us/RomaD)
